entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 16.
